text: @SpeakerPelosi madam speaker thank you for staying vigilant! trump will do terrible things towards our democracy now that the public is occupied with the COVID19 !! @SenBlumenthal @SenWarren @RepAdamSchiff @SenSchumer @SenSherrodBrown @SenWhitehouse trump will not hesitate to destroy democracy!
